title: Yoink drag-and-drop shelf utility for Mac enhanced with clipboard history widget and browser
content:
Yoink, the popular drag-and-drop app for Mac, launched version 3.6.5 today. This update brings notable improvements to your Yoink clipboard.

more…

The post Yoink drag-and-drop shelf utility for Mac enhanced with clipboard history widget and browser appeared first on 9to5Mac.
